Pre-Apocalypse[]: Nothing is known about Nelson's life prior to or as the outbreak began.
Post-Apocalypse[]: At some point in the apocalypse, Nelson somehow came into contact with a group named "the Saviors" which he subsequently joined. Nelson aided his group in terrorizing other survivors and communities around the area into subjugating to Negan's will, where their victims would be forced to give half their supplies in exchange for not being murdered. Nelson is among the Saviors who listen as Negan announces that they are going to war against the Militia . Nelson is going to his lookout post to switch with another Savior when he is fired upon by Carol and the Kingdommers. He throws a smoke grenade and manages to flee as walkers close in on the survivors. Nelson flees from the Kingdommers but is eventually hunted down and mauled by Shiva .
Death[]: Killed By Ezekiel Sutton (Caused) Shiva After escaping a group of Kingdom soldiers following the assault on the Sanctuary, Nelson attempts to flee to one of the Saviors outposts but just as the Kingdom soldiers catch up to him, he is mauled to death by Shiva, who was released to hunt him down on Ezekiel's orders.
Killed Victims[]: This list shows the victims Nelson has killed: Possibly numerous counts of zombies
Appearances[]: " The First Day of the Rest of Your Life " (No Lines) " Mercy " (No Lines) " The Damned " (No Lines)
Trivia[]: Nelson is the first named character whose death was caused by Ezekiel Sutton in the TV Series .
